# Government Tender Announcement
| Category      | Description                                                    | 
|----------------|----------------------------------------------------------------|
| Title          | Water Purification System                  | 
| Reference Number | cb-812-93495771                                 | 
| Amendment Number | 1                                               |
| Solicitation Number| 9F012-20230297/A                                  |
| Tender Closing Date | April 9, 2024, 2:00 p.m.                             |
| Procurement Method | Competitive - Selective Tendering                     |
| Tender Classification | RFP against Supply Arrangement                         |
| Evaluation Criteria | Lowest Cost-per-Point                                  |

## Background
The Canadian Space Agency requires a Water Purification System to meet the Agency's operational needs.

## Requirements
A proposal must meet the minimum of 9 points over the 15-point technical evaluation criteria to be considered. Mandatory technical criteria include:

* Produces water types 1 and 3 with resistivity between 18.2 MO·cm @ 25 °C, and total organic carbon (TOC) of 5 ppb.
* Produces water at a flow rate of at least 12 L/hr (type 3) or 2 L/min (type 1).
* Includes a 0.22 µm membrane filter for type 1 water purification.
* Utilizes portable tap water as the feed water.
* Comprises of a touchscreen display for system status monitoring and water quality display.
* Includes a 50 L tank with vent filter and sanitization system.
* Displays water purification’s resistivity, temperature, and TOC indication after each dispense.
* Specific purification media meet the following requirements: 
    o Pre-treatment cartridge consists of carbon block components, with a pleated filter.
    o Polishing cartridge contains high-grade synthetically activated carbon.

## Sourcing
The tender is only open to pre-qualified suppliers on the Supply Arrangement #E60PV-19EQUI. Suppliers interested in participating in the Supply Arrangement should submit their response to the Request for Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI/D on CanadaBuys (SAP Ariba).

## Contact and Evaluation
Pre-qualified suppliers may submit their proposals for consideration. Proposals will be evaluated for responsiveness, technical merits, and the lowest evaluated price per point. The Contracting Authority will select the supplier with the best value for money based on evaluation procedures as outlined in the Solicitation Document.

Fore more information, please contact:
* Jean-David Leblanc, Email: jean
